messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

journals not getting posted secondary sent thursday november journals getting posted secondary hi could you please raise ticket for below with high priority best regards applications analyst en sent thursday november journals getting posted secondary hi we have issue with october journals shown below these get posted with error saying unbalanced amounts we have checked amounts debit these come primary ledger if error appear there wonder what happens secondary please investigate or escalate asap we should get these resolved asap we have close period thanks kind regards accountant ext en
